capability.name: Leasing
capability.definition: The leasing products enables customers to finance equipment purchases using the leased item as collateral when necessary
capability.role: The Service Domain fulfills a general leasing arrangement for a single leased product or facility. The bank will take a collateral interest in the leased item to underwrite the associated loan/lease arrangement
capability.example: A customer requests a leasing arrangement to support the acquisition of equipment

key_features.name: Evaluate proposed leasing arrangement
key_features.description: Enables evaluate proposed leasing arrangement to support the leasing products enables customers to finance equipment purchases using the leased item as collateral when necessary

key_features.name: Review collateral value and title of leased item
key_features.description: Enables review collateral value and title of leased item to support the leasing products enables customers to finance equipment purchases using the leased item as collateral when necessary

key_features.name: Price/structure the leasing arrangement
key_features.description: Enables price/structure the leasing arrangement to support the leasing products enables customers to finance equipment purchases using the leased item as collateral when necessary

key_features.name: Negotiate and agree leasing arrangement
key_features.description: Enables negotiate and agree leasing arrangement to support the leasing products enables customers to finance equipment purchases using the leased item as collateral when necessary

key_features.name: Initiate and maintain the leasing arrangement through term
key_features.description: Enables initiate and maintain the leasing arrangement through term to support the leasing products enables customers to finance equipment purchases using the leased item as collateral when necessary
